group_1.textLeft: Phew...@Thank you, Big Sister.

group_1.textRight: It's nothing...
I'd really like you to take it easy for a while.

group_1.textLeft: Right now I need to work on saving Ui and@Sakurako from the Uwasa's captivity.

group_1.textRight: Sana, are you doing okay...?@Your Soul Gem is looking murky...

group_1.textLeft: I'm alright...
Compared to Ui and Sakurako,@who are struggling right now...

group_1.textRight: Heeey, I don't really get what's going on.
That Uwasa wanted to kidnap Sana, right?
First, let's assemble what we know about the new@Radio Wave Girl and the situation up to now.

group_1.narration: The Rumor of the Radio Wave Girl

When a girl feels the "desire to meet" someone,@the Radio Wave Girl appears and confronts her.@She'll ask "You want to meet me?"@After this, she attempts to abduct the girl's@consciousness, forcing them into a dream.
News reported in Kamihama@recently has stated this:
A young woman suddenly lost@consciousness and collapsed.@It has come to light that she had a common@thought with the previous victims.

She had longed to meet someone@before she lost consciousness.@She testified that she was about to be kidnapped@after she had heard the Radio Wave Girl's voice.@When she fainted, she remembered@having a terrible nightmare.

group_1.textLeft: It definitely has to be that@Sana look-alike behind it all.
She caused this series of events@and spawned the rumors.

group_1.textRight: Yes.
The Uwasa is based off of Ai.
And Sana was saying that she "wanted to meet her".
We inferred that the Uwasa had wanted Sana.
But it seems that the Uwasa@doesn't know who it wants.
And so it appears whenever a girl@says that she wants to meet someone.
I suspect that it was trying to kidnap them.

group_1.textLeft: However, it didn't have enough@magical power for that.
As a result, it was only able to knock the@victims unconscious temporarily...
But by stealing some of Nemu's power,@now it can fully capture their minds.
The Uwasa didn't kidnap Sana, though...

group_1.textRight: The reason for that, is just as@Big Sister Yachiyo said earlier.
I think that is why the Uwasa speaks the way it does.

group_1.narration: "This Uwasa is based on Ai and possesses Sana's magic,@so it could be said that the Uwasa is both Ai and Sana."
"Not only has their magic mixed, but also@their mutual desires to meet with one other.@As such, the person that it wants to meet is@someone that is both Sana and Ai...@In other words, itself.

group_1.textLeft: What you're saying is, the person@it wants to meet isn't Sana.
With that in mind, it may have@taken Ui in a confused stupor...?

group_1.textRight: More than likely.
There aren't very many reports of Uwasa sightings...
It seems that only one person@has lost consciousness at a time.

group_1.textLeft: So it indiscriminately takes one person at a time...?

group_1.textRight: About the Uwasa...
It seems as though it won't@manifest unless it meets "itself".
Even if Ui and Sakurako are conscious in the@space where the Uwasa has taken them...
They won't be able to defeat the Uwasa@so long as it doesn't manifest...

group_1.textLeft: No way...

group_1.textRight: The [textBlue:Rumor] is in a state like this...

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@The Rumor...
It tried to steal magical power so that@it could meet the girl it desired to meet,@but when it made its way into the world,@everything was different!@It has no idea who it wants to meet now!
Whenever it hears that someone wants to meet@someone, it peeks out from the digital world,@but it just doesn't know who it's supposed to meet,@so it takes them.
Someday the one it wants to meet will come back,@but for now it will spread anxiety over others@who want to meet within nightmares.@Bitter, sad, completely overwhelming!
There's no one that it wants to meet,@and it can't satisfy the overwhelming desire to meet,@so it can't get anywhere.@It's the hot rumor people are@all talking about in Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: Then, to materialize it and defeat it...
We don't have any choice but@to make the Uwasa meet itself...?

group_1.textRight: So it would seem...

group_1.textLeft: But, how would we...

group_1.textRight: Hmmm. Couldn't you, by chance, use Ai's power?

group_1.textLeft: So, just like that time with me, then.
You mean fusing Sana together with an Uwasa?

group_1.textRight: Yes, since the Uwasa this time is@an amalgamation of Sana and Ai.
Doesn't that make sense?

group_1.textLeft: Even if we defeat the Uwasa, though...
We don't know if we could separate@Sana and Ai afterwards.
It's too risky!
And besides that, it would@take a lot of magic from Nemu...

group_1.textRight: ...There is a way to get more magical power.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: We can use same method as the@Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, like you mentioned before...?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.narration: "The Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero@is that of a chocolatier with a storefront.@She gathered the potential of girls' hopes for@Valentine's Day, regardless of their pasts or future.@She then sold that chocolate at her storefront."
"Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero first scattered@the cacao beans of her [textBlue:Rumor] all across Kamihama@to absorb the magic potential, and then@she would collect the beans in the cacao pods."

group_1.textLeft: But we defeated that Uwasa already, isn't she gone?
Even if we gathered that potential,@we couldn't procure actual magical power...

group_1.textRight: Yes, and her cacao pods that gathered@such potential are also gone.
The potential has been returned@to its original owners.
But some cacao pods gathered emotional@energy as a substitute for potential.
Those pods may still remain.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.narration: "If a child realized on their own the potential@that should have been absorbed into the cacao beans,@the emotional energy generated by the realization of@that potential would be absorbed into the cacao pod instead."

"Originally, I would have had the Uwasa of@Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero recover the cacao pods,@so I don't know where they were planted.@After the Uwasa was erased,@they would have remained where they are."

"If we can ask the Uwasa of Chocolate@Shoppe No. Zero for the locations, we should be@able to recover the collected energy with Ui's magic,@and then convert it into power with the help of Touka's magic."

group_1.textRight: Or so I was thinking...but Sakurako@and Ui have been kidnapped.
So there's no way to find the cacao pods, and no@way to harness the energy within them.
It's certainly a difficult situation...

group_1.textLeft: But, we'd be able to do it if@we just rescued them, right?

group_1.textRight: It's just as Felicia says, how brilliant of her!

group_1.textLeft: Are you making fun of me?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sure we could manage something...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh...! But how...?!
